ygData.subject: Re: Armor & Absorption is all AC.
ygData.messageBody:
<
<<I have direct confirmation from Verant that armor type is the Damage
Absorption constant. >>

<< Point: Anyone can state this. Now give us facts. What everyone has said
for this thread is only conjecture. And the one thing I have found constant
in EQ is that conjecture = assume (and you know the saying about assume).
>>
>

If you can't accept what a poster is calling a fact based on your assessment
of the poster than you're wasting everyone's time by filling a post asking
him for more. Also note that the "because Verant said so" point wasn't his
only argument.

As far as the invisible, theoretical damage modifiers go, I'm curious as to
why so few people are defending their existance so vehemently. I'm also
curious as to what "facts" could possibly be brought to bear to prove or
disprove its existance other than the conjecture of very
experienced/methodical/intelligent players and the gospel of Verant.
